home.title: Action Findings
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit an Action Finding

actionFinding.created: A new Action Finding is created with identifier {{ param }}
actionFinding.updated: A Action Finding is updated with identifier {{ param }}
actionFinding.deleted: A Action Finding is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Action Finding {{ id }}?

actionFinding.tipDscHow: The activity belonging to the action plan to eliminate the root cause of the deviation.
actionFinding.tipDscEvidence: If you have an annex (photo, document, among others) that shows the result, it must be described.
actionFinding.tipObservation: Write the result of the action at the time of the review.
actionFinding.tipStartDate: Write the date on which the member agrees to start the activity.
actionFinding.tipLimitDate: Write the date on which the member agrees to complete the activity.
actionFinding.tipRealDate: Write the date the activity actually runs.
actionFinding.tipInvolved: Add those involved who should interact in the action.
